name: Pizza Panic!
description:
What do a cat, a skeleton, a crocodile and an octopus have in common???

PIZZA of course!!

Welcome to the wondrous world of "Pizza Panic!" where you and up to 3 friends can chaotically make beautiful but disastrous pizza together. Looking for a team building exercise that will improve communication skills? "Pizza Panic!" has you covered! Shout at your teammates as you frantically fling toppings to fulfill pizza orders in hopes of creating the most desirable Pizza's on the planet!

Made in one weekend for #TOJam12.

*REQUIRES CONTROLLERS TO PLAY (RECOMMENDED XBOX 360 CONTROLLERS)*

Created By:

Bryan Winters (@bryanwinters_) -- Programming
Mackenzie Eaton (@Macktimus) -- Programming
Mel Maduro (@MelMaduro) -- Art
Anthony Godinho (@AntGoesMarchin) -- Art
